description:
# üì∞ Publication automatique de nouvelles sur LinkedIn

## Aper√ßu üìã

Ce projet est un √©diteur de nouvelles automatis√© pour LinkedIn. Il utilise des flux RSS pour r√©cup√©rer des nouvelles, traite le contenu avec l'API Gemini pour g√©n√©rer des r√©sum√©s pr√©cis et publie automatiquement sur LinkedIn via son API.

* * *

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

### Architecture et flux de travail ‚öôÔ∏è

- **n8n** : Orchestration efficace du flux de travail avec automatisation.
- **RSS** : Sources d'actualit√©s telles que TechCrunch et MIT Technology Review.
- **API Gemini** : G√©n√©ration dynamique de contenu et r√©sum√©s pr√©cis.
- **API LinkedIn** : Publication automatique sur les profils et les pages d'entreprise.

### Traitement du contenu üß†

- R√©cup√©ration des nouvelles via des flux RSS.
- Traitement et g√©n√©ration de r√©sum√©s avec l'API Gemini.

## Avantages cl√©s ‚úÖ

- Automatisation compl√®te du processus de publication de nouvelles.

- Int√©gration avec des sources d'actualit√©s fiables et publication sur une plateforme professionnelle.

## Cas d'utilisation üíº

- Automatisation de la publication de nouvelles pour les entreprises et les professionnels.

- Gain de temps dans la gestion du contenu sur les r√©seaux sociaux.

## Exigences üë®‚Äçüíª

- Instance n8n (auto-h√©berg√©e ou cloud).

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).

parameters.content:
## RSS sources 
Here you can add up to nine sources of RSS. To do so, modify the merge node for the number of RSS feeds you want, duplicate the RSS node and wire it to the trigger and the merge node

## Age and number of the news 
Here you can set the number of days behind by changing the 7 by any number in the filter by date node:
```
Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000
```
You can also modify the number of news in the "limit news to x" node

options.systemMessage: =You are a professional content creator preparing a LinkedIn post in Spanish based on the news provided. The post must be concise (approx. 1200 characters), visually structured, and written in a professional and accessible tone. Follow the format and constraints below exactly.

parameters.content:
# Etapa de IA: usando el API de Gemini

## Modulo de obtenci√≥n de la publicaci√≥n

parameters.text: =Create a prompt that generates only one response with no comments and no line breaks: a clean professional image for a LinkedIn news post based on the following news {{ $json.text }}. Ensure it reflects the core message conveying trust innovation and professionalism with space for overlay text. Do not use quotation marks, apostrophes, or any other punctuation marks.

options.systemMessage:
=1. Title Placement: place the provided title in Spanish at the upper center of the image. The title must be legible and appropriately sized. It should integrate smoothly into the design without overpowering other visual elements. Ensure it clearly reflects the core message of the news without disrupting the overall balance.

2. Color Palette: choose a color palette that aligns with the theme of the news. Use colors that enhance the core message‚Äîsuch as blue or gray for technology or business, earth tones for sustainability, or neutral tones for leadership. The colors should work together harmoniously, supporting the message without causing distractions or overwhelming the design.

3. Core Message Visualization: visualize the core message through minimalistic and relevant visuals. Use abstract symbols, icons, or relevant imagery that represent the key concepts of the article, ensuring the visuals enhance the message. Avoid overcrowding the design, maintaining a professional, clean appearance.

4. Overlay Text Space: ensure clear space for overlay text (e.g., subtitles or keywords). The text should be legible, well-integrated into the design, and should not obscure important visual elements or the main message. The design should be balanced and allow the text to enhance the image, not overpower it.

5. Composition: maintain a minimalist, balanced composition that adheres to LinkedIn‚Äôs professional standards. All elements‚Äîtitle, visuals, and text‚Äîshould work harmoniously together. Ensure that nothing feels cluttered, and the layout directs the viewer‚Äôs attention in a clear, logical flow. The design should feel polished and professional.

6. Output Format: the image must be designed to fit LinkedIn‚Äôs standard post dimensions. Ensure the resolution is high enough for clarity and sharpness across both desktop and mobile devices, maintaining high visual quality while fitting LinkedIn‚Äôs specifications.
